title: Verifiable Employment Attestation
description: Schema of Employment Attestations for a natural persons.

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Certificate of Work

id.description: Defines the DID of the subject that is described by the Verifiable Attestation

familyName.description: Defines current family name(s) of the credential subject

firstName.description: Defines current first name(s) of the credential subject

startDate.description: Defines date of entry in company of the credential subject

occupationalCategory.description: Defines the function held in the company of the credential subject. Recommendation: see Occupational Category: https://schema.org/occupationalCategory
